Name: Elena
description:
As a widowed parent of a child, Elena works hard to support her family.

She has a seaweed retailing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. She is borrowing PHP 7000 through NWTF to buy seaweed to sell for her business.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her past 3 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.
